oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The World of Organic Agriculture - Statistics and Emerging Trends 2007
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Country reports
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to the survey, currently almost 31 million hectares of farmland are under organic management worldwide. The study presents the latest organic farming statistics including land use data, continent reports and reports about general developments in organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements IFOAM, DE-Bonn and Research Institute of Organic Agriculture, FiBL, CH-Frick
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements IFOAM, Research Institute of Organic Agriculture, (2007) The World of Organic Agriculture - Statistics and Emerging Trends 2007. International Federation of Organic Agriculture Movements IFOAM, DE-Bonn and Research Institute of Organic Agriculture, FiBL, CH-Frick.
